AMPDEVICESAGENT(8) System Manager's Manual AMPDEVICESAGENT(8)

NAME

AMPDevicesAgent — The devices agent for managing iOS/iPod device syncing

SYNOPSIS

AMPDevicesAgent

DESCRIPTION

AMPDevicesAgent is a per-user daemon which manages attached iOS/iPod devices.

There are no configuration options to AMPDevicesAgent. Users should not run AMPDevicesAgent manually.

December 6, 2018 Mac OS X
